message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.CC, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper deals with designing codes that are close to the capacity of certain channels, which is a core topic in information theory. 
2. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses the design of codes for broadcast channels, which is relevant to networking and internet architecture. 
3. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper may be relevant to the study of information flow in social networks, as the design of codes for broadcast channels can be seen as a form of information dissemination. 
4. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper may involve computational complexity in the design of the codes. 
5. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper may involve the use of algorithms in the design of the codes.
